<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Delete a permission from the user who owns a wallet.</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"delete"} path={"/operations/permissions/by-user/{id}"}></MethodEndpoint>



To delete permission from the user who owns a wallet. Only the root user can delete another user's permission.

## Request

<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Path Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"id","required":true,"in":"path","description":"User ID.","schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Header Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"x-wallet-uuid","in":"header","description":"Sender Wallet UUID (if empty, your default Wallet UUID will be settled)","schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"nonce","in":"header","description":"The nonce ID is a UUID (v4) used to uniquely identify the requisition. All requisitions must have an identifier.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

The wallet permission deleted successfully.

</div><div></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"401"} value={"401"}><div>

User authentication failed.

</div><div></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"422"} value={"422"}><div>
